WITH LINK(id, name, parent_id) AS ( SELECT id, name, parent_id FROM category WHERE id='${baseId}' UNION ALL SELECT category.id, category.name, category.parent_id FROM LINK INNER JOIN category ON LINK.ID = category.PARENT_ID ) SELECT id FROM LINK WHERE NAME IS NOT NULL and id in ( select id from category where id not in (select distinct parent_id from category where parent_id is not null));
